title: DORK Diaries: Skating Sensation
author: Rachel Renee Russell
genre: Fiction, Children’s / Middle‑Grade, Humor / Realistic Fiction
description: The fourth book in the  series. Follows 14‑year‑old  who — with her friends — joins an ice‑skating competition to save a local animal shelter.
